div.p: We thank Erni from Sriwijaya University for help in South Kalimantan and Mr. Saleh for guiding us to Saleh Cave. We thank J. Whan and T. Orr for help in the laboratory. NERC Grants NE/D001501 and NE/D01185x/1, Australian Research Council Federation Fellowship (FF0883221) and Discovery (DP140101319) to MB, and James Cook University’s College of Science and Engineering, National Geographic Society’s Scientific Research 8845-10 to CW supported this research.
